summary: Backend and frontend testing completed for ACWR Analytics App. All backend API tests passed (14/14). Frontend login, navigation, and athlete details page work correctly. i18n translations for analysis APIs verified working - returns English/Portuguese based on lang parameter.

issues: Some buttons show mixed translations ('View Detailed Charts' in English instead of 'Ver Gráficos Detalhados' in Portuguese)

critical_code_review_comments: Backend ANALYSIS_TRANSLATIONS is well-structured with en/pt/es/fr translations
API endpoints correctly use lang parameter and return translated content
Frontend AnalysisTab properly uses useLanguage() hook and passes locale to APIs
GPS sessions grouping logic correctly handles session_id and date-based grouping
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - used existing test user and athlete
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_api.py cover authentication, athletes CRUD, and analysis with i18n. Analysis APIs return 'Insufficient data' when there's no GPS/wellness data for the athlete, which is expected behavior. ANALYSIS_TRANSLATIONS dictionary is at line 895 in server.py with translations for en, pt, es, fr.

verified_features.analysis_translation_en: Returns English messages: 'Insufficient data for analysis'
verified_features.analysis_translation_pt: Returns Portuguese messages: 'Dados insuficientes para análise'
verified_features.gps_data_api: Returning 0 records (no GPS data for test athlete)
